passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::Sounds like they were doing some pretty wild experiments down here...

[[p:Think Julia played any role in this?]]
[[p:I'm sure Mom had something to do with it...->p:Think Julia played any role in this?]]

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::Let's not jump to conclusions.

Jasper,twisted::We'll learn more if we keep looking around.  Lets go!
